initialDisplayPosts.title: Introducing Multi-part Posts with Nested Routing
initialDisplayPosts.summary: The blog template supports posts in nested sub-folders. This can be used to group posts of similar content e.g. a multi-part course. This post is itself an example of a nested route!

initialDisplayPosts.title: Introducing Tailwind Nexjs Starter Blog
initialDisplayPosts.summary: Looking for a performant, out of the box template, with all the best in web technology to support your blogging needs? Checkout the Tailwind Nextjs Starter Blog template.

initialDisplayPosts.title: Images in Next.js
initialDisplayPosts.summary: In this article we introduce adding images in the tailwind starter blog and the benefits and limitations of the next/image component.

initialDisplayPosts.title: Deriving the OLS Estimator
initialDisplayPosts.summary: How to derive the OLS Estimator with matrix notation and a tour of math typesetting using markdown with the help of KaTeX.

initialDisplayPosts.title: Markdown Guide
initialDisplayPosts.summary: Markdown cheatsheet for all your blogging needs - headers, lists, images, tables and more! An illustrated guide based on Github Flavored Markdown.

initialDisplayPosts.title: The Time Machine
initialDisplayPosts.summary: The Time Traveller (for so it will be convenient to speak of him) was expounding a recondite matter to us. His pale grey eyes shone and twinkled, and his usually pale face was flushed and animated...

initialDisplayPosts.title: O Canada
initialDisplayPosts.summary: The scenic lands of Canada featuring maple leaves, snow-capped mountains, turquoise lakes and Toronto. Take in the sights in this photo gallery exhibition and see how easy it is to replicate with some MDX magic and tailwind classes.

initialDisplayPosts.title: Sample .md file
initialDisplayPosts.summary: Example of a markdown file with code blocks and syntax highlighting
